thread.section_title: Arbor Hyde Park Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (London, England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Clean, new, good location and good breakfast
thread.title_full: Clean, new, good location and good breakfast - Review of Arbor Hyde Park Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Otto A
title: Clean, new, good location and good breakfast
text:
This is a nice hotel in short walking distance from several tube stations. Bus is only 200m away by Kensington park.
Hotel is newly built in an old building. Rooms are quite small but very clean. We got good service and I was very pleased with the breakfast buffet.
